english.segment1: It's been one of those days. Where all my blue has turned to grey. A thunderstorm. Above me forms. And I need sheltering
english.segment2: So Maker of the wind and rain. Can you calm the hurricane. In my soul. Out of control. Or help me face what may
english.segment3: Chorus. I love you. I want you. I need you right now. I can't live without you. Don't wanna learn how. With all of my heart
english.segment4: I surrender I bow. Elohim..Cover me
english.segment5: No matter how hard I try. Nothing seems to satisfy. The deepest part of my heart. Where shallowness resides. 'Til I'm so desperate I call Your name. And you revive my soul once again. Of all that I. Crave inside. This can't be denied
